snippet: The N.C.A.A. announced that the state’s colleges could once again bid to host championships after the governor signed a law removing the Confederate flag from the grounds of the State House.
abstract: NCAA announces that colleges in South Carolina can once again bid to host NCAA championships after Gov Nikki R Haley signs law removing Confederate flag from grounds of the State House.
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. announced that the state’s colleges could once again bid to host championships after the governor signed a law removing the Confederate flag from the grounds of the State House.

headline.main: With Flag Gone, South Carolina May Host College Playoffs
headline.print_headline: With Flag Gone, South Carolina May Host College Playoffs
